name: Natural Defense
description:
Tutorial (Must read!)

A & D = Move left and right Respectevily

Space = jump

Mouse left = Shoot (While in place mode = place turret)

Q = Toggle urret placing mode 

O = Make the window bigger

F11 = Toggle fullscreen

Hud

White numbers (top left)  = HP

Green number (top left) = Tower hp

Aqua number (top right) = Energy

Blue number (bellow energy) = Turrets Cost

Objective

You have to defend your self and your plantae crystal, kill enemies to obtain points and place turrets using  while you place turrets you cant move, and enemies can damage your crystal, random events will happen!
